title: U.S. SEC Denies Coinbase's Push for Crypto Regulations as 'Unwarranted'
description: U.S. crypto exchange Coinbase's petition to the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to prod it toward a system of tailored rules for digital assets was rejected by the regulator on Friday.

title: $BTC: Valkyrie Investments CIO Highly Confident of SEC’s Approval of Spot Bitcoin ETFs in Q1 2024
description: Steven McClurg, the co-founder and Chief Investment Officer (CIO) of Valkyrie Investments, recently engaged in a comprehensive discussion with Talia Kaplan on CNBC Crypto World. The conversation centered around Valkyrie’s pending application for a spot Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF) in the United States, alongside other asset managers like BlackRock, Fidelity, and WisdomTree. title: Binance on the SEC’s Radar: Here Is Why Ripple (XRP) and Cardano (ADA) Investors Should Care
description: Dive into the intriguing world of crypto as Binance gears up for a legal face-off with the SEC. Uncover how this big clash could send ripples through the market, especially for Ripple (XRP) and Cardano (ADA) enthusiasts. Get the inside scoop on what this showdown means for your favorite altcoins and the ever-evolving crypto universe.

title: Connect Kit Exploit Sparks Criticism of Ledger’s Security Framework
description: On Dec. 14, 2023, Ledger’s Connect Kit, a Javascript library for wallet connectivity, suffered a significant exploit. This incident, which was contained within two hours, has brought forth a number of criticisms of Ledger’s security practices. title: Cruise announces a significant reduction in its workforce
description: Cruise, the autonomous vehicle subsidiary of General Motors (GM), is undergoing a significant workforce reduction, cutting 24% of its employees, approximately 900 people. This strategic move is part of a broader cost-cutting initiative following a concerning incident on October 2, where a pedestrian was struck and dragged by one of Cruise’s robotaxis. title: UK lawmaker urges the government to pay attention to blockchain
description: The House of Commons recently echoed with a call for increased government attention to blockchain technology, as UK Member of Parliament Natalie Elphicke urged authorities to fully embrace the potential of this transformative innovation. title: MultiBit (MUBI) Rockets To Unprecedented 76% Price Increase In Just 24 Hours
description: In a notable development, MultiBit has emerged as the pioneering dual-sided bridge, revolutionizing seamless cross-network transfers between BRC20 and ERC20 tokens.  This innovative bridge, by facilitating effortless movement of cryptocurrency tokens between Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) networks like Ethereum and BNB blockchains, and the Bitcoin blockchain, significantly enhances cross-chain interoperability. title: First Trust files for Bitcoin buffer ETF
description: Financial services firm First Trust submitted the Bitcoin buffer filing ETF to the United States Securities and Exchange Commission on Dec. 14.

title: Analyst Says Bitcoin Could Hit New All-Time Highs Earlier Than Expected, Updates Outlook on Shiba Inu Rival
description:

Pseudonymous crypto trader Kaleo tells his 611,000 followers on the social media platform X that he believes Bitcoin will reach new all-time highs (ATHs) sooner than he previously thought.
